transArray.content: The breakfast was rich and long. The room was clean and tidy.

Dear guests, hello! Thank you very much for your trust in Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel for staying here. Thank you very much for your recognition of the breakfast types in the hotel. Only by staying well and eating well can you feel at home. I believe that with your support, we will continue to improve the quality of all aspects of the hotel to ensure that you will be happy every time you stay. All hotel staff sincerely look forward to your every stay and wish you a happy life! Manager: Ren Yuanyuan
